description:
The final fight begins. Domon and Master Asia fight an extraordinary battle, and Domon convinces Master Asia`s plans would`ve failed anyway.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu, maître ! Master Asia s’en va à l’aube
Farewell, Master! Master Asia`s Last Breath
Leb wohl, Meister! Master Asias letzter Atemzug
Saraba Shishou! Master Asia, Akatsuki ni Shisu
さらば師匠! マスター・アジア, 暁に死す
